My Learning Process

Even as an experienced developer, I remain deeply committed to staying abreast of the latest trends and technologies in web development. Below is an outline of my ongoing learning journey, showcasing how I continuously refine and advance my skillset.

1

Read Documentation

I research new technologies and closely review documentation to understand how each language/library works on a fundamental level

2

Planning A Learning Path

I try to figure out a path of learning that will lead to me best understanding how the technology is utilized (Udemy course, making small applications, adding to previous applications)

3

Developing Skills

Once I have decided how I think I can efficiently obtain the skillset I'm after, I get to work creating new content that will build my knowledge

4

Feedback

Once I've finished my task, I try to gain feedback through other devlopers using online platforms or programmers I know personally to see if there are any ways I can improve or build upon my newfound knowledge
